item.title: Small problem with new command I made
item.dc:creator: @Nightz Nightz
item.description:
@Nightz wrote:

or [code]if (command.startsWith(“food”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(392, 1000);

		} [/code]

for 1k mantas lol

PlayerRights >= 0 )

0 = players
1 = moderaters
2 = admins
3 = owners

item.title: Small problem with new command I made
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

i’m pretty sure i know what the problem is…Its that you have the manta rays unnoted. If they are noted then i don’t know what the problem is but here is what it should be:

if (command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 0)
 			{	
     addItem(392, 28);

  			}

item.title: Small problem with new command I made
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

This is the code:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“food”) && playerRights >= 0)
{
addItem(391, 28);

		} [/code]

It’s for 28 manta rays in your inventory but when I type it in, it only gives me 1 manta… anyone know what wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 07:40:19 PM[/size][hr]Does anyone know?
